name: The adventure of Rococo
description:
Alpha version release! About

Top-down action adventure made with pixel art.A game that finds quests and develops stories from the world not talking much.

Story

Led by a dream, the boy takes a sword and goes adventure.

Details

The boy first looks for ways to go from the island to the kingdom.

The only way to the kingdom is to get a ship, but the process to that is the freedom of the player. (The island has not been completed yet, so please wait for the update.)

Work in progress

It is currently alpha version.Limited items and maps, stories.

The first part of the island was completed.
The second part of the island will be updated little by little.

Features Current state
  • Introduction of the story can be played.
  • The first part of the island.
  • A battle part that also needs to be hidden.
  • 7 maps.
Next goal
  • Implementation of some quests.
  • The second part of the island.
  • More enemies.
  • 2-3 bosses.
  • Add 2 types of battle items.
Completion
  • More quests, enemys,weapons,more.
  • From the island to the kingdom.

Notification :Although it is the above schedule, there is a possibility of fluctuation.

Method of operation

↑↓←→:wsad:
start or continue:enter
use item:k l
talk,treasurebox:space
inventry:i
